titleStmt.title: Truth and error discouered in two sermons in St Maries in Oxford. By Antony White Master of Arts of Corpus Christi Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: White, Anthony, 1588 or 9-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield printer to the famous Vniversity for Henry Curteyne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
